trans-unit.source: Defines the location of a script resource.
trans-unit.target: 定義指令碼資源的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition> object represents a single logical script resource.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition>物件都代表單一邏輯的指令碼資源。

trans-unit.source: This resource might have several different physical representations, such as a debug version, a release version, and a version on a content delivery network (CDN).
trans-unit.target: 這個資源可能會有數個不同實體的表示方式，例如偵錯版本，發行版本和版本內容傳遞網路 (CDN)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the debug mode path of the script resource on a content delivery network (CDN).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在內容提供網路 (CDN) 上的指令碼資源偵錯模式路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of a CDN that contains debug script resources.
trans-unit.target: 包含偵錯指令碼資源的 CDN 路徑。

trans-unit.source: When you reference a CDN path, you can enable CDN support for the page by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您參考 CDN 路徑時，您可以藉由設定啟用 CDN 支援頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the release mode path of a script resource on a content delivery network (CDN).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在內容提供網路 (CDN) 上的指令碼資源發行模式路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of a CDN.
trans-unit.target: CDN 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: When you reference a CDN path, you can enable CDN support for the page by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當您參考 CDN 路徑時，您可以藉由設定啟用 CDN 支援頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdn%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or set a value that indicates to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> whether a script resource should be accessed using a secure connection to the content delivery network (CDN) path when the page is accessed using HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值向 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager" /> 表示當使用 HTTPS 存取頁面時，是否應該使用內容提供網路 (CDN) 路徑的安全連接存取指令碼資源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the CDN should be accessed using HTTPS; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該使用 HTTPS 存取 CDN 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition.CdnSupportsSecureConnection%2A> property to check whether the associated script resource should be accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> using a secure connection (SSL) to a CDN.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition.CdnSupportsSecureConnection%2A>屬性來檢查是否應該使用存取相關聯的指令碼資源<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>使用 CDN 的安全連線 (SSL)。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition.CdnSupportsSecureConnection%2A> property, you can avoid a warning message from the browser when your Web application attempts to request secure content from a CDN that supports SSL.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceDefinition.CdnSupportsSecureConnection%2A>屬性，您可以從瀏覽器警告訊息時避免您的 Web 應用程式會嘗試從 CDN 支援 SSL 要求安全的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the debug mode path of the script resource that is used when debug mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在啟用偵錯模式時所使用的指令碼資源偵錯模式路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of a script resource that is used when debug mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在啟用偵錯模式時所使用的指令碼資源偵錯模式路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a JavaScript expression that is used to detect whether a JavaScript file loaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來偵測是否已成功載入 JavaScript 檔案的 JavaScript 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript expression.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript 運算式。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdnFallback%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to render inline script that will revert to loading the library from a local server location if the script fails to load from the CDN.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.EnableCdnFallback%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呈現將還原為從本機伺服器的位置載入程式庫，如果無法從 CDN 載入指令碼的內嵌指令碼的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For script libraries from Microsoft, this value is already set.
trans-unit.target: 從 Microsoft 指令碼程式庫，針對已設定此值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to register a script yourself and get CDN fallback support, you would set this property to an expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要自行註冊的指令碼，並取得 CDN 後援支援，您會設定這個屬性的運算式。

trans-unit.source: For example, to test whether a jQuery library has been loaded, you can use an expression like the following:
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要測試是否已載入 jQuery 程式庫，您可以使用的運算式如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the release mode path of the script resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指令碼資源的發行模式路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of a script resource.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼資源的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an assembly object that contains the script resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含指令碼資源的組件物件。

trans-unit.source: An assembly object that contains a script resource.
trans-unit.target: 包含指令碼資源的組件物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the script resource in the specified resource assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在指定之資源組件中的指令碼資源名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of a script resource.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼資源的名稱。
